title: C
description: C is a general-purpose, imperative, compiled, and procedural programming language. It is famous for its efficiency, portability, and direct hardware control. C is the foundation for many modern programming languages.

items.title: C Tutorial
items.description: Learn C the right way with this step-by-step tutorial. It covers the language fundamentals, including variables, functions, loops, and pointers.

items.title: Learn-C.org
items.description: A comprehensive tutorial for learning C, from compiler setup to advanced topics like data structures and memory allocation.

items.title: C Programming - GeeksforGeeks
items.description: A vast collection of tutorials and concepts to learn C, including code examples and practical exercises.

items.title: C - Programiz
items.description: Explore detailed tutorials and references for C, covering fundamental concepts, operators, functions, pointers, and more.

items.title: C Tutorial - W3schools
items.description: Learn the basics of the C language with this interactive and easy-to-follow online tutorial.
